str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
From pas and a derivative of rheo; all out-spokenness, i.e. Frankness, bluntness, publicity; by implication, assurance.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To make clear (visible, manifest), make known. From phaneros; to render apparent.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 2nd Person Singular

str2: The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably from the base of komizo; orderly arrangement, i.e. Decoration; by implication, the world (morally).
